name: Lemon Basil Chicken
author: Lillian's Kitchen
summary: Fabulous lemon basil chicken dish that is always a crowd pleaser! Quick and easy, this recipe never fails. Serve plain or over rice.
ingredients: 4  chicken breast halves, boned and skinned
directions: Place chicken breasts on a cutting board
Flatten slightly using the smooth side of a meat mallet
Dust both sides lightly with flour
Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat until bubbling
Saute chicken breasts until lightly browned, about 3 minutes per side
Add chicken stock, lemon juice, basil, and lemon zest
Cover and simmer until chicken is no longer pink in the center, about 10 minutes
Transfer chicken to a warm platter
Boil remaining liquid over high heat, uncovered, until reduced to 1/2 cup
